Detailed Description

Statistics about configuration record errors.

The object is meant to be used together with FeStatList_t. This object collects statistics about bad configuration data. The following errors are counted: the data which is read back does not agree with the data which was written; configuration data was written twice but never read back.

Author:
Goetz Gaycken, LLR - Ecole polytechnique
Date:
feb, 2006
